Wechat WechatMoments The keystore you entered is incorrect, please re-enter Yes Recommend writing it down on paper and save at a safe place Once the private key lost, your assets will be dangerous. Please do not take screenshots or record the screen. There are asset in your wallet. Before you delete, please make sure that you have properly saved your mnemonics, keystores or private keys. Otherwise, your assets may be permanently lost Please backup your mnemonic words as soon as possible to ensure asset safety.\nFor asset safety, system or third party application backup is not supported for now. Backup now> Transaction failed NAS ERC20 Swaps Swapping Congratulations, swap successful! Swap failed! Introduction NAS nano now supports tokens swap! 1. ERC 20 tokens are your asset, but cannot be used on mainnet transaction. 2. How to tell: Nebulas mainnet NAS address begins with "n1", while ERC 20 tokens address begins with "0x". 3. Other tokens swap methods: Huobi, gate.io or other exchanges. Swap later Swap now I Agree NAS Swap Set token swap address To receive ERC 20 tokens Set Now Backup Backup ERC20 wallet Backup ERC20 wallet 2.Import tokens and gas fee Your imported tokens will be fully swapped OK, start to swap 1.Choose Wallet Please backup your mnemonic words before receiving mainnet NAS Next Important tips The selection cannot be changed, please make sure you have made a backup Cancel Confirm Add Wallet You have no mainnet NAS wallet, please add one You will receive your NAS ERC20 via your token swap address. Go to settings: 1. Set transfer password; 2. Backup to ensure asset safety. Set now Set your password Next Confirm Set successful Please backup your mnemonic words to ensure asset safety. Make sure your environment is secure and no one can see your screen. Backup now Backup now > Backup later Please import the full amount of swapped tokens into the following address (1 NAS ERC20 = 1 mainnet NAS) Swap address Balance Waiting for Ethereum processing Refresh NAS ERC20 Gas fee (0.001~0.002) Import NAS ERC20 and 0.001 ETH Tokens swap details Swapping Tokens swap will be finished within around 72 hours If not completed within 72 hours, please contact:
contact@nebulas.io Ethereum transfer failed Tokens are still in your wallet, please try again Swap Successful Mainnet NAS wallet NAS ERC20 Gas Fee Start Try Again Swap Again Swap History Swap Amount Successful Failed Waiting Gas Fee You have no token swap history Create Successful Backup now For asset safety, please backup mnemonic words before receiving tokens For asset safety, please backup mnemonic words before transferring tokens Backup later Please Backup First * Receive Mainnet NAS 1.Choose Mainnet NAS Wallet Mainnet Wallet Receive your NAS ERC 20 Backup your ERC 20 address Please backup your mnemonic words before transferring ERC 20 tokens Refreshing Confirm swap Thank you for participating in the Nebulas Coin Swap (the “Coin Swap”). By transferring your Nebulas ERC20 Tokens (the “Tokens”) to the specified address above and providing your Nebulas wallet address (the “Wallet”) for receipt of the Nebulas Mainnet Coins (the “Coins”), you hereby agree, represent and warrant to Nebulas IO Foundation (the “Foundation”) as follows: \n1.You are the owner of record of the Tokens, free and clear of any and all liens, security interests, restrictions, options or encumbrances. There have been no assignments or other transfers of any interest in the Tokens. \n2.You understand that by participating in the Coin Swap, all of your rights, title and interest in and to the Tokens will be terminated and exchanged for the Coins. \n3.You have full control of the Wallet, including all private keys required to transfer Coins from and otherwise use such Wallet, and has implemented reasonable security measures to protect the Wallet from unauthorized access. YOU MAY SUFFER ADVERSE TAX CONSEQUENCES AS A RESULT OF THE COIN SWAP. YOU HEREBY REPRESENT THAT (A) YOU HAVE CONSULTED WITH A TAX ADVISER THAT YOU DEEM ADVISABLE IN CONNECTION WITH THE COIN SWAP, OR THAT YOU HAVE HAD THE OPPORTUNITY TO OBTAIN TAX ADVICE BUT HAVE CHOSEN NOT TO DO SO, (B) THE FOUNDATION HAS NOT PROVIDED YOU WITH ANY TAX ADVICE WITH RESPECT TO THE COIN SWAP, AND (C) YOU ARE NOT RELYING ON THE FOUNDATION FOR ANY TAX ADVICE. YOU AGREE TO BE FULLY RESPONSIBLE FOR ANY TAXES RESULTING FROM THE COIN SWAP.\n\nTHE FOUNDATION MAKES NO WARRANTY WHATSOEVER WITH RESPECT TO THE COINS, INCLUDING ANY (A) WARRANTY OF MERCHANTABILITY; (B) WARRANTY OF FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE; (C) WARRANTY OF TITLE; OR (D) WARRANTY AGAINST INFRINGEMENT OF INTELLECTUAL PROPERTY RIGHTS OF A THIRD PARTY; WHETHER ARISING BY LAW, COURSE OF DEALING, COURSE OF PERFORMANCE, USAGE OF TRADE, OR OTHERWISE. YOU ACKNOWLEDGE THAT YOU HAVE NOT RELIED UPON ANY REPRESENTATION OR WARRANTY MADE BY THE FOUNDATION, OR ANY OTHER PERSON ON ITS BEHALF. WITHOUT LIMITING THE GENERALITY OF THE FOREGOING, YOU AGREE TO ASSUME ALL RISK AND LIABILITY FOR THE RESULTS OBTAINED BY THE USE OF ANY COINS AND REGARDLESS OF ANY ORAL OR WRITTEN STATEMENTS MADE BY THE FOUNDATION, BY WAY OF TECHNICAL ADVICE OR OTHERWISE, RELATED TO THE USE OF THE COINS.\n\nTHE FOUNDATION SHALL NOT BE LIABLE TO YOU, AND YOU WILL INDEMNIFY, DEFEND AND HOLD HARMLESS THE FOUNDATION AND ITS AGENTS AND ADVISORS, AND THE SUCCESSORS AND ASSIGNS OF THE FOREGOING, FROM AND AGAINST, ALL OR ANY PART OF ANY THIRD PARTY CAUSES OF ACTION, CLAIMS, LIABILITIES, LOSSES, COSTS, DAMAGES AND EXPENSES (INCLUDING, WITHOUT LIMITATION, ATTORNEYS’ FEES AND EXPENSES) (COLLECTIVELY “CLAIMS”) FOR DAMAGES TO OR LOSS OF PROPERTY ARISING OUT OF OR RESULTING FROM THE TRANSACTION HEREIN, EXCEPT TO THE EXTENT SUCH CLAIMS ARISE FROM THE GROSS NEGLIGENCE OR INTENTIONAL MISCONDUCT OF THE FOUNDATION.\n\nTHE FOUNDATION SHALL NOT BE LIABLE TO YOU IN ANY ACTION OR CLAIM FOR INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, CONSEQUENTIAL, INDIRECT, PUNITIVE, EXEMPLARY OR STATUTORY DAMAGES ARISING OUT OF OR RELATED TO THE COIN SWAP, WHETHER THE ACTION IN WHICH RECOVERY OF DAMAGES IS SOUGHT IS BASED UPON CONTRACT, TORT, STATUTE OR OTHERWISE EVEN IF THE FOUNDATION HAS BEEN ADVISED OF SUCH POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGES. EXCEPT FOR LIABILITY ARISING FROM THE FOUNDATION’S FRAUD OR INTENTIONAL MISCONDUCT, YOUR AGGREGATE LIABILITY FOR ANY CLAIM OF ANY KIND, FOR ANY LOSS OR DAMAGE ARISING OUT OF, CONNECTED WITH OR RESULTING FROM THE COIN SWAP SHALL IN NO CASE EXCEED THE NUMBER OF TOKENS TRANSFERRED TO THE FOUNDATION. ANY ACTION RESULTING FROM ANY CLAIM ARISING UNDER THIS AGREEMENT MUST BE COMMENCED WITHIN ONE (1) YEAR AFTER THE CAUSE OF ACTION HAS ACCRUED. DO NOT PROVIDE YOUR WALLET ADDRESS ON ANY EXCHANGE FOR THE RECEIPT OF THE COINS. ALL WALLET ADDRESSES MUST BE CREATED ON THE OFFICIAL NEBULAS WEBSITE. Please be careful to avoid asset loss. The application is running on a rooted device and has potential security risks. Please be careful to avoid asset loss. Please do not take screenshots or record the screen. It is recommended that you write down the Mnemonic Words in the order presented and store them in a safe location. Please do not take screenshots or record the screen. Be sure to keep your keystore safe. Please do not take screenshots or record the screen. It is recommended that you save the private key and store it in a safe location. Copy successful! Please keep the private key in a safe location and clear the devices clipboard after backing up to avoid asset loss! Copy successful! Please keep the keystore in a safe location and clear the devices clipboard after backing up to avoid asset loss! The password was entered 5 times incorrectly. Please try again in 10 minutes. Password has been locked for 10 minutes, please try again later Show Mnemonic Words Show Private Key Show Keystore Hide Mnemonic Words Hide Private Key Hide Keystore Backup Mnemonic Words Backup Keystore Backup Private Key Payment Details Notification Transaction Notice Information Notice Vote Max Amount dStaking Start Pledge Total Rewards Prev Rewards dStaking Rate Current Mintable Amount Prev Burned Amount Prev Minted Amount dStaking Wallets Pending Tips 1. The assets that the user utilizes in their pledge stay in their own address and is never transferred.\n2. At the beginning of each cycle (about 25 hours), NAX will be dynamically issued to the pledge address according to the pledge rate of the whole network from the previous cycle.\n3. The more NAS that is pledged from the address and the longer a pledge is active (coin age), the more NAX will be distributed to the address.\n4. If the pledge is reduced or cancelled, the coin age will be initialized and new pledges will be calculated from a new state.\n5. When the wallet balance is less than the requested pledge, the pledge is automatically cancelled. OK Cancel dStaking dStaking Periods Balance Rewards History Balance Select Wallets My dStaking NAS Amount Minimum 5NAS Confirm Adjust My dStaking Insufficient NAS Reserve No dStaking Wallet Keep dStaking Cancel dStaking Alert Your NAS has been dStaking for %1$s periods and once your dStaking is cancelled, you will no longer receive NAX rewards. Canceling dStaking will consume approximately %2$sNAS as a Gas Fee. Coin Age will be initialized upon reduction of dStaking NAS and your rewardable NAX will be decreased. No NAX Earned Yet dStaking Failed dStaking Successful dStaking NAS
